document.masterDocTitle: A review of the genus Oodescelis Motschulsky, 1845 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae Platyscelidini) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A review of the genus Oodescelis Motschulsky, 1845 (Coleoptera: Tenebrionidae Platyscelidini) from China

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material (studied). Lectotype , designated here:
♂ ( HNHM ), Sergiopol //
Platyscelis minuta , Ball.
// Typus,
Oodescelis affinis Seidlitz
( Figs. 55 , 76 ).
